title: Contains Duplicate
description:
Contains Duplicate

Problem

Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice in the array, and return false if every element is distinct.

Examples:

  • If nums = [1,2,3,1], the output should be true.
  • If nums = [1,2,3,4], the output should be false.
solution_text: The most efficient approach uses a hash set to keep track of elements we've seen. This algorithm has O(n) time complexity and O(n) space complexity in the worst case.
solution_code:
def containsDuplicate(nums):
    # Create a set to track seen numbers
    seen = set()
    
    # Iterate through the array
    for num in nums:
        # If we've already seen this number, return True
        if num in seen:
            return True
        
        # Add the number to our set of seen numbers
        seen.add(num)
    
    # If we get through the entire array without finding a duplicate
    return False
